text:
[Verse]
Rolling down the avenue
Stereo hums in my ride
City lights are flashing blue
Chasing dreams with open eyes

[Verse 2]
Wind rushes past the window
Neon signs light up the way
Feel the rhythm soft and low
Turn the night into day

[Chorus]
Midnight drive feels so right
Hands on the wheel hope in sight
Streetlights flashing like a sign
Life on the road feels divine

[Verse 3]
Engines roar the night so cold
But inside my heart's aglow
Memories as stars unfold
In the night they softly show

[Bridge]
Darkness fades to twilight’s hue
Morning whispers coming through
Every turn's a chance that's new
Sky transitions pink to blue

[Chorus]
Midnight drive feels so right
Hands on the wheel hope in sight
Streetlights flashing like a sign
Life on the road feels divine
title: Midnight Drive
